attributes.action: Strip First Bus of their monopoly
attributes.background: Fist bus run a dreadful service, praying on their customers who have no alternative, abusing their monopoly position. First bus need to be stripped of their monopoly or made to provide a decent service putting passengers before profit!

rejection.details:
Local bus services are the responsibility of local councils. 

You talk to a local councillor about the quality of bus services in your area. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
